carouselTestimonials.review: I was drowning financially, living paycheck to paycheck. It was very obvious that her goal was to help pull me out of the pit I dug myself into. Working with Micheal has been absolutely life changing!

I am so grateful I have worked with Micheal so far! She is never judgmental and always so encouraging and excited for any progress I make. I would highly suggest trusting her with your financial darkness!
I was nervous before the session - she put me right at ease. She was genuinely enthusiastic about my life and financial goals. Can't recommend her highly enough!
I lost track of where I was at with my finances. Going through the work with Micheal has turned everything around for me. I definitely recommend it!

noVideoTestimonials.name: Krista Alstrand
noVideoTestimonials.fullQuote: I am so grateful I have worked with Micheal so far! Finances has always been an area of my life that is a bit out of control and I can tend to ignore. It is stressful looking at it and facing it but I feel very supported by her. She is never judgmental and always so encouraging and excited for any progress I make. She provides thorough notes of our sessions so I can just be present and listen and think about what I want and need financially. I would highly suggest trusting her with your financial darkness and letting her help you see the light!
